text: Oregon Undersea Gardens is an aquarium in Newport, Oregon, United States. The tourist attraction opened in 1966, and plans to close were announced in 2019. ==External Links== ==References== Category:1966 establishments in Oregon Category:2019 disestablishments in Oregon Category:Aquaria in Oregon Category:Newport, Oregon Category:Tourist attractions in Lincoln County, Oregon Category:Zoos disestablished in 2019 Category:Zoos established in 1966
title: Oregon Undersea Gardens
